About Dark Sun Labs

Dark Sun Labs is a team of experienced engineers, researchers, and developers with a combined experience in the field spanning over 40 years. With projects in AI, Blockchain Technology, Web 5, Gaming, and Cryptography, Dark Sun Labs continues to keep itself up-to-date with the most modern technology, and has positioned itself well to implement efficiently, effectively, and ethically the technologies of tomorrow.

Gaming on Web 3 has been heating up, and Moonbeam has poised itself as a premiere choice to build web 3 gaming projects on. With that in mind, Dark Sun Labs are committed to building a turn-based monster battle game on it. The game, called Moonwarz will borrow the best features from Web 2, in terms of simplicity and ease of use, and Web 3 in terms of reward mechanisms and trustless distribution. Moonwarz will truly be a game for all ages, all skill levels, and all risk appetites.

The detailed explanation for what we do is available in the FAQs section.
